title: This update could make or break Rocket League.

media:group.media:title: This update could make or break Rocket League.
media:group.media:description:
Psyonix leaked that Rocket League is coming to Unreal Engine 5! In this video I will explain what the switch might mean for the future of the game, what challenges the developers have to overcome in order to port the game, and show my wishlist of features that I would like to see in the new game version.

Creator Code:
ROCKETSCIENCE
I earn commissions when you use the code to buy in the Epic Store, or RL and Fortnite in game shops. #EpicPartner

0:00 RL is getting ported to UE5
0:38 What UE5 means for RL
7:18 Difficulties of porting RL to UE5
My UE5 RL wishlist
9:59 Ways to improve physics
17:30 Fix 2 known netcode issues
20:14 Separate graphics with gameplay impact
21:01 Shadow at any distance
21:33 Make a UI with decent performance
24:30 Where I've been
